title: Please Help me!! what font
content:
I need to know what font is this please. Thank you very much for your help

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822103913im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Foto%2001-07-14%2016%2003%2036_6528.jpg)
author: Luzzy

comments.content:
Varsity Classic Serif A is close. Adjust the width, and it's not a bad match:

[http://www.ffonts.net/Varsity-Classic-Serif-A.font](http://web.archive.org/web/20140822103913/http:/www.ffonts.net/Varsity-Classic-Serif-A.font "http://www.ffonts.net/Varsity-Classic-Serif-A.font")
